Pre-Game Insights: The Ireland vs South Africa ODI series will begin on Wednesday (October 2) afternoon at the Sheikh Zayed Stadium in Abu Dhabi.
South Africa will aim to forget their shock defeat in a T20I against Ireland last month.
Ireland will aim to repeat their T20I performance in the ODI series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ODI series will help the Proteas prepare for the upcoming Champions Trophy in Pakistan.
This will be the first time the UAE will host an ODI between Ireland and South Africa.
The head-to-head record between Ireland and South Africa in ODIs on UAE soil stands at 0-0.
Others: South Africa have a massive 6-1 lead in the head-to-head record against Ireland in ODI cricket.
Ireland's only ODI victory against South Africa came in a bilateral match at The Village in 2021.
